column4: Using Gnome I am recently having problem that whenever I insert the first cdrom after reboot name of the cd-rom does not change even when I replace the cd-rom with another. What may be the problem?
which application is it that mounts the cd when one inserted?
any way to see why it would keep the cd's name in computer:/// although it ejects the cd properly
Have you made any changes to your nautilus preferences in gconf-editor?
i remember using gconf-editor for totem but not for nautilus
any way to replace the gconf settings with defaults?
better yet only the nautilus gconf settings
Not that I know of, sounds like a Windows feature to me.  ;)
any way to see why it would keep the cd's name in computer:/// although it ejects the cd properly
Sorry, been looking, can't find it.
